text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I apologize, everyone. That was<n>certainly not the
performance I wanted<n>to give.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, why the heck are you<n>apologizin'? You're
making it sound<n>like you've crimed us or somethin'.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And the Japan Cup is just a bonkers<n>race, yeah? Finishin'
fourth with all<n>the other stars out there is pretty<n>dang
respectable.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
She's right! I was just as enraptured<n>with your running
today as I have ever<n>been!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Plus, no crazy incidents happened<n>today. Our trainer here's
definitely<n>gonna treat ya to somethin' nice,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, yeah! That's right! Let's go<n>stuff our faces,
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, yeah! That's right! Let's go<n>stuff our faces,
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I... must politely decline.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have the Arima Kinen to prepare for,<n>and I'm not even
hungry, having just<n>finished a race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, and I must make a call to<n>Grandmother. Please go
ahead<n>without me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Everyone... I am so, so sorry.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Guess that wasn't very convincing...<n>You too, though. You
suck at acting!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sorry. It took me a second to catch on,<n>but I tried...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sorry. It took me a second to catch on,<n>but I tried...

When McQueen fled the room, I<n>wasn't sure whether to go
after her<n>or give her some space—a moment of<n>indecision
I'm already regretting.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, if it isn't Oguri! Didja come out<n>to cheer for McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Of course. I owe this team a lot, and I<n>heard its brightest star
would be<n>running.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But where is that star, might Iask?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It seems something happened<n>here. Will you tell me
about it?

I tell Oguri Cap everything that<n>transpired since she
departed from<n>the team.

I tell Oguri Cap everything that<n>transpired since she
departed from<n>the team.

About how we were in danger of<n>being disbanded, and how
we were<n>able to overcome that by recruiting<n>new
members.

About the embarrassment McQueen<n>had suffered at the
autumn Tenno<n>Sho, and her attempt to redeem<n>herself
today—only to place fourth.

I explain how everything keeps failing<n>to come together for
Mejiro McQueen,<n>no matter how she tries to make the<n>
pieces fit.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see. I can sympathize with her quite<n>a bit.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
She's convinced herself that she has<n>to live up to every
expectation of her.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You think so?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I went through the same thing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Good results breed expectations, and<n>before you know it,
you've bound<n>yourself to meet those expectations.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Soon, they all start to feel like<n>obstacles in your path.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Obstacles... I see.

The only reason this team is still<n>around is because Mejiro
McQueen<n>was there for us.
Everyone looks up to her... aspires to<n>be like her.

And it's not just the other runners. I<n>piled on the pressure
with every<n>victory, too.

And it's not just the other runners. I<n>piled on the pressure
with every<n>victory, too.

It's obvious now that she has been<n>struggling with
everything riding on<n>her shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
As a trainer, perhaps you could find a<n>way to turn those
obstacles into a<n>source of power.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: From obstacles to power...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oguri, how did the old man go about<n>helping you do that?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oguri, how did the old man go about<n>helping you do that?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm, I suppose I could tell you...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But it's just what worked for us. You<n>and McQueen have
your own special<n>bond.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I think you'd best approach it in a<n>way that works for you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The bond that McQueen and I share...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The bond that McQueen and I share...

I have none of the skill or charisma<n>that my mentor
possessed, yet<n>McQueen still trusted me to be her<n>trainer.

I have none of the skill or charisma<n>that my mentor
possessed, yet<n>McQueen still trusted me to be her<n>trainer.

Just why did she choose to place her<n>faith in me? What can
I do now in her<n>hour of need?

Just why did she choose to place her<n>faith in me? What can
I do now in her<n>hour of need?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, no hesitation at all. That part of<n>you hasn't changed
at all from your<n>assistant trainer days.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Always putting us first...

That's it. That's what I need to do. I<n>need to stand by her
side, and offer<n>her my faith and support.
choice_data_list: I'm going to go look for McQueen.

text_block_list.text:
That's it. That's what I need to do. I<n>need to stand by her
side, and offer<n>her my faith and support.
choice_data_list: I'm going to go look for McQueen.
I'm going to go look for McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Mmkay. Well, I guess I'll go loiter<n>around the academy road
and near<n>the station.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I'll go see if she went back to the<n>academy!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: And I'll go looking around the<n>racecourse!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Maybe she went to the shrine? I'll<n>drop by and check!
choice_data_list: Thank you, all of you. Let's go!
Thank you, all of you. Let's go!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Our team's ace needs us now more<n>than ever!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Our team's ace needs us now more<n>than ever!
